property.name: hadoop.security.authentication
property.description: Possible values are simple (no authentication), and kerberos

property.name: hadoop.rpc.protection
property.description: A comma-separated list of protection values for secured sasl connections. Possible values are authentication, integrity and privacy. authentication means authentication only and no integrity or privacy; integrity implies authentication and integrity are enabled; and privacy implies all of authentication, integrity and privacy are enabled. hadoop.security.saslproperties.resolver.class can be used to override the hadoop.rpc.protection for a connection at the server side.
